item.title: TikTok says it will be 'forced to go dark' unless it gets 'definitive' statement
item.description: TikTok faces a ban on Sunday, unless it cuts ties with parent company ByteDance.

item.title: Retired Georgia minister found not guilty in 1975 killing of girl in Pennsylvania
item.description: A retired minister from Georgia has been found not guilty in the 1975 killing of an 8-year-old girl
